title: What do you know about the interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a single woman: Rain is a symbol of goodness and life. The Creator sends her to the shore, and life returns to her, but she may be the cause of successive floods and torrents that destroy all means of life. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a single woman: It can indicate goodness and happiness, but it can also foretell unfortunate events, according to the details of the vision. What is the interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a single woman? Rain in a dream for a single woman? It is one of the visions that gives hope, optimism, and happiness, and often indicates happy future events in the future. The interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman walking in the rain in a dream indicates the good reputation that this girl enjoys, her good conduct, and her good personality. She is famous among those around her and they often talk about her in the best terms, and describe her with the best qualifications. Just as rain is often one of the symbols of abundant goodness, in a dream it expresses the sustenance that the dreamer will receive, which will come to him in multiple forms of money, good people, or other good things. The gifts. In fact, rain is a celebration of the fertility and growth of many agricultural lands, and in a dream it also indicates the end of crises and problems and a significant improvement in all areas of her life. Interpretation of a dream about walking in the rain for a single woman indicates her desire to improve her mood, ease the burdens that surround her, and clear Her mind is full of problems. But if she is working in the rain or walking for a specific goal, perhaps to reach her job, this indicates that she is a patient and stable person and often comes for her own benefit and herself to help those around her. Walking in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that rain It indicates the many successes and good things that the dreamer will enjoy in the near future (God willing). His vision also indicates personal qualities that carry the highest symbols of humanity, such as loving goodness and happiness for all and helping people achieve their goals in life. As for walking in the rain with joy and joy It is very happy news that a person is about to receive, and perhaps something rare will happen to him. It also expresses that the dreamer will soon be blessed with abundant money, through which he will be able to solve his crises and pay off his accumulated debts. Sometimes rain in a dream carries some bad interpretations and it could be A harbinger of danger near the dreamer. It can also indicate the presence of a health problem or illness that the dreamer or one of his family members may be exposed to, which will be the reason for the cancellation of many projects and the interruption of the work of all family members. What is the interpretation of a dream of standing in the rain for a single woman? ?According to the opinions of most interpreters, it often indicates feelings and desires in the dreamer's heart, his control and overcoming his behavior and control, even if it seems to her otherwise. Her future depends on many changes in her life. It may also be evidence that the Creator will bestow upon her many good things and abundant food in the coming days after a long period of adversity. It may also express her feeling of remorse for her many sins.

title: Interpretation of seeing exams in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing exams in a dream, exams and a diligent student. The student feels very anxious about the exam date and feels dread at this time and feels confused about it. There is no doubt that he worked hard, studied and reviewed, but with every exam there was fear. He focuses all his thoughts before the exam date and the time it takes to get the highest final grades. The student's understanding is up to the teacher explaining the material. By all standards, it is worthy of being delivered to the student or it is not worthy of delivering information to the student is what enables the student to reach the top, and that is why we will learn today in this article about the interpretation of seeing exams in a dream. Interpretation of seeing exams in a dream. Examination in a dream sometimes carries the meaning of good and sometimes it includes evil, according to... What Ibn Sirin narrated regarding his vision in a dream. We mention the following: The inability to answer tests shows the hardships and harm that the dreamer is suffering from. The blank exam paper symbolizes the difficulty of the period that the fortuneteller is going through, while the black paper shows the abundance and seriousness of these problems. A dream about exams is an exam from God in order for his servants to live. It indicates Failure of the examination indicates the servant’s need to get closer to God and perform many acts of worship. Seeing a teacher in a dream during an examination is evidence of the leader’s high status and superiority. Interpretation of seeing an examination in a dream is an interpretation by Imam Al-Sadiq. The interpretation of seeing an examination in a dream according to what was narrated by Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq can be divided into two parts: As follows: In the case of being able to answer the exam, this means the dreamer’s strength to bear problems and difficulties and the strength of his faith. Not being able to answer the exams indicates that something unpleasant will happen to the pioneer. The dreamer examining a person in a dream alone indicates that the dreamer is seeking to know this The person and understanding his intentions. Interpretation of a single girl’s vision of examsThe following is the interpretation of a woman’s vision of exams according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream means that she is not ready to take exams and shows her inability to bear her responsibilities and face difficulties and problems in her life. Absenteeism from bachelor’s exams shows that they are missing out on many things. It is a good opportunity related to marriage or work. Seeing an unmarried woman who was unable to enter the board of directors to take the exam due to the delay shows that her marriage is too late. The reluctance of an unmarried woman to take exams in a dream indicates that she is approaching the date of her wedding and that she is not ready for it. An unmarried woman who passed exams in a dream, and the grades were honorable, indicate that she will soon be happily married, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing cheating in an exam in a dream: We can clarify the interpretation of cheating in a dream through the following points: Seeing a man trying to cheat in a dream means that he is a person. He is unclear and follows unnatural ways in his life to deal with others. Cheating in a dream for a single woman symbolizes her trying to get rid of problems in her life, but in ways that are not good. Seeing a married woman trying to cheat in a dream is evidence of...

title: Going down the stairs in a dream

preview.html: Seeing him descending the stairs quietly in a dream shows the wrong decisions that the dreamer makes in his life and fails in some of them, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing descending the stairs in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl saw in a dream that she was descending the stairs and was in the dream for a long time and she was afraid. And this This indicates that she will prefer something important in her life and will be very sad when it appears, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl, seeing in a dream someone close to her, forces her to go down the stairs in the dream. This indicates that this single girl will face many problems in her life during This period. And seeing a sad girl quickly descending a long staircase in a dream is a clear indication of the presence of bad things that will happen to her in this period of her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if an unmarried girl dreams that she is falling from the top of the stairs and feels extreme fear, it indicates that there is something Bad things will happen to this only girl in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase for a married woman, a single woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing a staircase in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is going down the stairs in a dream with her husband and she is afraid. It shows that there will be many Among the problems that this married woman will witness in her life. If a married woman looks at the stairs in a dream and is afraid to go down them in the dream. This is an indication that there are some problems that this married dreamer will see and experience. Either she will see a married woman looking at the stairs to go down them in A dream and you cannot see it. It indicates the good life that you will live, which will overcome the problems and bad things that you will see. Seeing a married woman in a dream means that she falls from the top of the stairs in the dream and is injured in the dream. This is a clear indication that something bad will happen to this married woman In her life during this time. Interpretation of seeing the stairs in a dream for a divorced woman. If the divorced woman sees in her dream that she is going down the stairs, and she was very afraid in the dream that she is going down alone. It shows the bad things that she will see and experience during this period of her life. This is the divorced woman who sees the high stairs. In a dream, she quickly lowered it in the dream, and was not afraid. This is an indication that this divorced woman will see bad things in her life, and God knows best. Or a divorced woman seeing in a dream that she and her ex-husband are falling from the top of the stairs in the dream. It explains that she will witness some recurring problems with her husband now. And God knows best. If a divorced woman saw in her dream that she was looking at the high staircase, and she crossed it and did not descend in the dream. This is an indication that this divorced woman will succeed in her professional life during this period, God willing. Read also: Seeing the demolition of buildings in a dream. Interpretation of seeing descending the stairs in a dream. A dream about a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is descending the stairs in the dream, and he was very tall in the dream. It explains that there are some problems and troubles that this dreamer will witness in his field of work. And the dreamer sees in a dream that he is descending the stairs and is very afraid.

title: Everything you are looking for to interpret a dream about insects in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about insects: Seeing insects is considered one of the frightening visions for many of us, and for this reason we find that some people rush to search for the meanings expressed by this vision due to its different meanings, including what is good and what is evil, and this varies according to many things, including the type of insect and body. in which it is located. Do the details that a person sees in a dream also appear, as the dream varies depending on the viewer, whether he is a man or a woman? Is she also single or married? This can be seen from the following article. Interpretation of a dream about insects: Seeing insects in a dream symbolizes psychological fears and obsessions that violate a person in his life, forcing him to do things that he does not like, but do unintentionally. This vision also expresses fighting many battles in life and the difficulty of winning them or Achieving the desired goal, which indicates a miserable failure and falling under the burden of life without the ability to resist or achieve the desired goal. The vision may be an indication of weak enemies who are not devoted to them and look at them with pity, which may expose them to losing many of their social relationships, and this in turn will affect their success rate. This vision is a warning to the pioneer not to underestimate the competitor, whether he is sincere in competing with him or aggressive and harbors hatred towards him. Therefore, he must be careful and take all necessary precautions in every step he takes. If a person sees many insects, this indicates the worries that surround him on all sides, responsibilities and duties. entrusted to him and which he must carry out without laxity or delay. If the insects symbolize ordinary enemies, but these enemies tend not to appear or resort to running when they see the fortuneteller, but when they appear, they occupy him in every possible way, and this can be done by Spreading rumors that are intended to undermine his reputation. If he sees insects, and they have a strange shape, this symbolizes that he will go through many experiments and participate in several competitions without bearing their consequences. Insects also express his exposure to extreme distress, which can be long or short, Depending on the severity and severity of the disease. Insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin goes on to explain the vision of insects to say that seeing them expresses worries and sorrow and going through difficult periods in a person’s life. If the dreamer sees insects, this indicates that things will turn upside down and he will enter a stage where he will witness many... Sudden changes, and if he cannot adapt to them or respond to them, he will suffer a lot. Also, seeing insects expresses envy and an eye lurking on the fortuneteller wherever he goes, learning all his secrets and trying to exploit them against him. If the dreamer is married, then this vision expresses the extent of psychological discomfort and problems. That arises between him and his wife, and the inability to find satisfactory solutions to the recurring crises in his life. If he is a merchant, this vision indicates a lack of money and huge losses, as he went through a period of depression and lack of profits. If his money increases, he must check its source and make sure of It comes from legitimate ways

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the takbir in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Takbir Interpretation of a dream about seeing Takbir in a dream The meaning of Takbir in a dream for a married woman, a pregnant woman and a man, the meaning of Takbir in the ear of a newborn, the symbol of Takbir in a dream. Out loud, the interpretation of Takbir and prayer, seeing Takbir and chanting, and expanding or saying God is more important than the rituals of prayer and holidays in Islam, and when you see it in a dream, you will certainly have many meanings and interpretations. Which we will deal with accurately with the interpretation of the vision of expanding the dream with the best jurists and scholars. Interpretation of the vision of magnification by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of the dream of magnification in a dream, as mentioned by the great scholar Ibn Sirin as one of the desired visions that indicate the opening of the doors of livelihood, blessing and goodness. Seeing the strengthening of Friday prayers in a dream is a sign of good luck, hearing good news, achieving desires and aspirations, and success in work and study. Dreaming that the Eid is growing in a dream is good news for me, with joy and many happy occasions associated with it in the coming period. Seeing magnification, for fear of envy in a dream, means that the seer is safe from the dangers of God's command and must give him charity. Interpretation of seeing the magnification of Eid al-Adha in a dream is one of the visions of praise that indicate goodness, enormous savings and kindness to me. Interpretation of the dream of expansion by Nabulsi: The dream of seeing the saying of God is wonderful in a dream, as Imam Nabulsi indicated as evidence of liberation from fears and sorrows and overcoming crises. Seeing magnification in the ear of a newborn in a dream is evidence of good offspring and the blessing of money, wealth, concealment and healing from Illness. Seeing magnification everywhere in a dream means that the dreamer is religious and close to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing magnification for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream of expansion and praise in a dream for an unmarried woman, and this indicates that the date of her engagement and marriage is approaching with the right person and that she will be happy with him. Seeing the strengthening of Eid al-Fitr in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of many happy and joyful events that will occupy her in the coming period. The dream of repeating God is great in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that she is a good, pious and kind-hearted girl characterized by chastity, chastity and good conduct. Seeing the expansion of a gene in a dream for someone is a sign of the danger surrounding her, but she will soon overcome it completely and get rid of it. The dream of seeing yourself heading towards magnification and encouragement in a single woman's dream is evidence that she will achieve what she wants and aspires to in her personal and professional life. Interpretation of a dream of magnification for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing enlargement / reduction in a dream for a married woman who has not yet given evidence that she will soon become pregnant will change her life for the better. The dream of a large expansion of the house in a married woman's dream indicates a wide livelihood and an increase in money and blessings in children. Seeing The swelling of the husband in a married woman’s dream indicates the disappearance of anxiety and sadness, victory over deceitful enemies, and the return of their hands. The dream of seeing Eid al-Takbir in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will receive a great benefit from

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sheikh in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a sheikh in a dream You can find out what it brings Interpretation of a dream of seeing a sheikh in a dream and whether it is good or bad All this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a sheikh in a dream Interpretation of a dream of seeing a sheikh in a dream can indicate achieving goals, and God The highest and most knowledgeable When an unmarried girl sees the sheikh, she seeks help from wisdom, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees the sheikh, this may mean getting rid of worries, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a Christian marrying a Muslim woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a Christian marrying a Muslim woman in a dream may indicate immoral acts, and God knows the unseen. When you see marrying a Christian in a dream, it may be an indication of an invalid act, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of the bridge in a dream by Ibn Sirin... The meaning of crossing the bridge and its falling in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a bridge in a dream for different occasions, and what about the most prominent interpretations it refers to in reality? This is what we answer you through our article in the encyclopedia, as the bridge is what one walks on to reach his destination, bypassing all the difficulties and obstacles that he can find by passing under this bridge, especially since it is a bridge that shortens many of the mazes that appear when passing from one place to another and another crossing the bridge. Therefore, many people wake up from their stagnation, searching for the meanings and connotations indicated by the vision of crossing the bridge in a dream, searching for the meanings and signs that symbolize them to guide them in their lives. Liberating the soul, mind, and consciousness. Between this and that, we present the concepts that the vision actually refers to, so let us learn about the most prominent interpretations that appeared in seeing the bridge through our article, so follow us. Interpretation of the bridge in a dream: Seeing the bridge and crossing it in the dreamer’s dream indicates. His ability to change from one state to another is better, as the bridge in this case symbolizes the path of insight to salvation and the right path, and God knows best. Seeing crossing the bridge in a dream means that he feels where he is heading and what he wants from this path. Integrity in his life, and God knows best. Seeing the bridge in a dream, according to Al-Nabulsi, indicates: guidance in the life of this world, in addition to the ability to acquire knowledge and traditions that make a person capable of overcoming the obstacles and trials of life that God places in life. From it, it makes him escape from the torment of the afterlife, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a bridge in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer can meet human needs in reality, so the dreamer should not be stingy with others in his efforts to help and provide a helping hand, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a bridge in a dream According to its length and width, it indicates the status that the dreamer has in reality, and God is the Knower of the Unseen. Dreaming of a bridge made of stone instead of clay or wood is interpreted for the dreamer as: a spacious, good and abundant living of money, family, husband, and parents who love the dreamer in reality, And God knows best. A bridge over the sea. Interpretation of a dream for a single woman. Every girl dreams of starting to realize her dreams. To find a job that suits the nature of the idea, her inclinations, and her studies, regardless of her desire for a good husband who will share with her the journey of climbing, building, and working, and thus creating a happy and good family. Therefore, the expert searches in her dream for signs and repercussions that symbolize the happiness of her date, wanting to see what is hidden behind this vision of Interpretations and symbols in her dream, to wonder about the most prominent details inside her. It is the vision of the bridge. What about these concepts? Are they good or not? We look at this below: Seeing a bridge in one's dream denotes. Marrying soon to a righteous, God-fearing man, and God knows best. The dream of walking on a river bridge symbolizes for a single woman in a dream. Progress and moving to a better, more established position, and more capable of achieving what you desire in life, is one of the praiseworthy visions contained in goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. To see the bridge over

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new abaya by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new abaya: The abaya or jilbab is a long robe that a person wears and has many types and colors, and there are some for men and women. Buying a new abaya in a dream has many interpretations mentioned by scholars, which we will explain in some details in the following lines of the article. Interpretation of a dream about buying A new abaya. The jurists mentioned many interpretations of the dream of buying a new abaya, the most important of which is what can be clarified through the following: If a person sees during his sleep that he is buying a new abaya, this is a sign that God Almighty is giving him contentment and happiness in his life, in addition to the abundant sustenance he has. . I will enjoy. Dreaming of buying a new abaya in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s constant striving to obtain the approval of his Lord and to follow His commands and stay away from His prohibitions. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a new abaya, this is a sign that he will earn a lot of money in the coming period. If a man dreams of buying A new abaya, then the dream proves that he maintains his dignity and his wife’s good character and does not expose her to gossip. To get the correct interpretation, conduct a search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new abaya by Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations that the scholar Muhammad bin Sirin came up with - may God have mercy on him - In the vision of buying a new abaya in a dream, the most prominent of them are the following: Seeing the abaya in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s closeness to his Creator and performing many acts of worship and obedience. And seeing the purchase of a new abaya during sleep means that God - Glory be to Him - comforts the dreamer, and replaces his sadness with joy. And it brings him satisfaction and comfort in his life. If a married woman dreams that she is buying a new abaya, this is a sign of the great benefit that awaits her in the coming period. The white abaya in a dream shows the changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life and will change his life for the better. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new abaya for single women if she dreams If a girl is buying a new abaya, this is a sign that she will attend many happy family occasions and celebrations in the coming days, such as weddings, birthdays, etc. Scientists have also reported that seeing a single woman buying a new abaya in a dream leads to improving her living conditions, and earning a lot of money, which It makes her get everything she wants. Commentators explained that when a girl dreams of buying a new abaya, this means that she is a girl who can balance taking responsibility, enjoying her life, and doing what she wants. Seeing an unmarried girl buying a new abaya in a dream symbolizes the approaching engagement of her lover and then her marriage to him. She must prepare for that. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new abaya for a married woman: If a woman dreams of buying a new abaya, this is a sign that the coming period of her life will be happy and satisfied. The dream also indicates a good relationship with her husband and the extent of the respect, love, understanding, and interest that exists between them strengthens with the passage of time. If a married woman buys a new, loose or relaxed abaya, this is evidence of her love for her partner

title: Interpretation of eggs in a dream - seeing chicken eggs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing eggs in a dream by Ibn Sarbin Eggs Interpretation of raw eggs in a dream Interpretation of eggs in a dream for a pregnant woman Interpretation of boiled eggs in a dream Interpretation of fried eggs in a dream Interpretation of breaking eggs in a dream Interpretation of chicken eggs in a dream As for eggs, it is a different interpretation. Al-Kirmani said that a woman is interpreted as the Almighty saying ( As if they are hidden eggs. Whoever sees a chicken in his presence, it means that a child will be born to a maid or an evil woman. Whoever sees unknown eggs, not knowing which bird they are, it is interpreted that he will marry a beautiful woman like this egg. Whoever dreams that he takes an egg to eat it, he will take Money from fatigue, especially if he eats it. Whoever sees broken eggs and intends to eat them, it is interpreted by the woman’s request, and her life is extended with it. Whoever dreams that he has defiled the eggs and eaten their shell and left what is inside, it is interpreted in two ways: eating the dead person’s money or taking his shrouds. And whoever dreams that he is sitting on Eggs like a bird, this indicates that he stands with women, and whoever dreams that a chick hatches from the eggs, this indicates that he will benefit from the children of these women. Whoever dreams that he placed an egg under a bird and that the bird hatches a chick from that egg, then this indicates the revival of his dead deeds, and it was said: the faithful boy. He who dreams that he has a lot of eggs, it means that a lot of money will come from corruption. A dream about duck and goose eggs is interpreted by a miserable boy, and a dream about bird eggs is interpreted as kindness and joys. . Eggs in a dream are a profound indication of the beginning of a new life and new beginnings, and eggs can be a sign of new birth, as they are a symbol of life, fertility, or unrealized possibilities. It is known that the world takes the shape of an oval, so the egg itself has become a metaphor for the world. The interpretation of an egg in a dream could be a new development in life, such as a new job. Thus, eggs in a dream often have a positive meaning. If you see an egg suddenly appear in your hands in a dream, it means that a gift is on your way. If you see that you are inside an egg store, it means that you will be more successful at work. The yolk of an egg shows vitality and creativity. If you see eggs falling on someone, it means that It indicates that this person has wronged your rights and received his punishment. Interpretation of a dream about eggs by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees a hen laying eggs, his wife will give birth to a son. Whoever dreams of eating raw eggs means he is eating forbidden money or is affected by stress. Whoever dreams that a hen lays a lot of eggs and that his wife is pregnant, he will be He has as many children as he has eggs. Whoever sees that he still has a lot of eggs, then he has a lot of money and is afraid of losing it. Whoever dreams that boiled eggs remain in his hands, God will make it difficult for him, and if he eats them, he will marry a rich woman. Whoever dreams that He gives his son an egg and it breaks, and his son dies. Many eggs in a dream for one person means marriage. As for eggs, if they are seen in dishes, they indicate a slave girl; According to the Almighty’s words: (As if they were hidden eggs). He claims to be the undertaker. Interpretation of a dream about eggs by Ibn Shaheen. Whoever sees more than 4 eggs in a dream indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about cooking wheat

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about cooking wheat in a dream. Some may seek to determine the interpretation of a dream about cooking wheat in a dream. It is one of the disturbing dreams for which the owner wants to know an explanation, but he must be careful that these interpretations are the jurisprudence of interpretive scholars and the site managers have nothing to do with them, so you must be careful and do not believe completely. In these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about cooking wheat in a dream: Cooking wheat in a dream can indicate overcoming the harsh life circumstances that the dreamer is suffering from, thanks to God. If one sees that he is cooking wheat, this may indicate his ability to pay off debts or get rid of From the financial crisis that he suffered from. It is possible that seeing wheat cooked in a dream indicates the end of a quarrel or a problem that the visionary was suffering from in his life during those days. Seeing wheat boiled and cooked in a dream may indicate good changes that may occur to the dreamer during this time, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dry feed in a dream: Taking dry feed in a dream may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. If there is a vision of buying chicken feed in a dream, this may indicate good changes that will occur. For the dreamer in his life during this time, thanks to God. If you see yourself eating animal fodder in a dream, this may indicate diseases that may afflict the dreamer, and God knows best. Seeing storing dry fodder in a dream may indicate distance from the material obstacles that the dreamer may face during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving fodder to the living in a dream: Seeing a dead person giving food to the living in a dream may indicate good things that may come to the dreamer during those days, thanks to God. Seeing taking fodder from the dead in a dream could indicate positive changes that may It happened to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of taking food from the dead in a dream indicates the good changes that will occur to the vision or the ability to satisfy desires and dreams, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving food from the dead in a dream indicates It indicates many good things that the person with the vision can achieve in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sifting flour in a dream Seeing a flour sieve in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the person with the vision may gain in his life during this time, thanks to God. In the event that one sees sifted flour in a dream, this may indicate wrong words received by the dreamer and his family and he must ask God for help. If you see sifted flour in a dream, this may indicate losing money in a bad market during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a fine sieve in a dream could indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about harvesting barley in a dream Collecting barley in a dream may indicate material gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this time, and God knows best. If one sees that
